description: Hulu's new show tells the tragic, horrific story of 14-year-old Reena Virk's murder, but it's not interested in true crime sensationalism.
title: ‘Under the Bridge’ Review: A Miniseries That Interrogates the True Crime Genre

description: Filmed on authentic locations in Poland by meticulous Canadian director Louise Archambault, 'Irena’s Vow' is one of the most astounding true stories to ever emerge from the ashes of the Holocaust.
title: ‘Irena’s Vow’ Is One of the Most Astounding Holocaust Stories

description: The centennial program features Graham classics as well as a midcentury ballet and a powerful new work by a contemporary choreographer.
title: Martha Graham Dance Company Explores the American Experience, Past and Present

description: "I've been making work about my own experience in the world from the moment I wanted to be an artist."
title: Her Life in Art: An Interview With Painter Loie Hollowell

description: From Cape Cod's windswept dunes to Florida's sugar-sand strands, these beach resorts sizzle with dreamy summer vibes
title: From Nantucket to the Florida Keys: Where to Find Summer Bliss on the East Coast

description: The fruits of the prolific portraitist's labors are displayed to spectacular effect alongside the sitters' original gowns in “Sargent and Fashion.”
title: John Singer Sargent and the Art of Dressing to Impress

description: From a splurge-worthy trio and a lavender-scented lotion to a drugstore classic and dreamy vanilla creme, these are the best hand lotions for travel that we're loving and coveting right now.
title: Jet Set: The Best Hand Creams for Travel
